text:
this place had a very home-like feel to it.

it's not a fancy restaurant where you get served food its a fast food joint, but they take really good care of you.

I got the chicken & rice and it was one of the best i have had in the city my girl who is a vegetarian came with us and they customized a dish for her - that's service!

I echo the review below mine, the owner was super friend - which i think is a testament to excellent customer service!

I really wanted to like this place after reading all the reviews that praise it, but I have had better tasting shawarma elsewhere. I ordered my food around 5PM so I dunno if it was a bit old, but the chicken was a little dry, and did not have enough flavour for me. It was spicy enough and the service is friendly, but the taste didn't do it for me.
Had the lamb sharwma  and the chicken on fries. Super delicious! The owner is super friendly too! 5/5 would recommend
